short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to log work on SRA

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension to log work on SRA.
It helps user logging whole month worklogs in one click.

version 6.0.0 updates:
- only log to current date
- redirect to SRA if url does not matchs
- update UI

version 6.0.1 updates:
- fix errors in case multiple projects

version 6.0.2 updates:
- fix errors in case removing a worklog while having multiple projects
